content.metaTitle: Contrimar - Trusted Costa Blanca South Builder | Golf Property Specialists
content.metaDescription: Contrimar builds quality new homes across Costa Blanca South since 2003. Specialists in La Finca Golf properties, Oasis developments. From €249,000-€495,000.
content.heroIntro:
Contrimar stands as one of Costa Blanca South's most trusted property developers, with over 20 years of experience building quality homes in the Vega Baja region. Specializing in golf lifestyle properties and contemporary Mediterranean homes, Contrimar has earned a reputation for exceptional build quality, reliable delivery, and outstanding customer service.

With their signature 'Oasis' developments spanning prime locations at La Finca Golf, Guardamar del Segura, and across the Orihuela Costa, Contrimar consistently delivers homes that exceed expectations. Whether you're seeking a luxury golf villa, a stylish townhouse, or a modern apartment, Contrimar's portfolio offers something for every buyer seeking quality new build homes in southern Costa Blanca.
content.aboutSection:
Founded in 2003, Contrimar has grown to become one of the most recognized developers in Costa Blanca South. The company's success is built on a simple philosophy: build high-quality homes at fair prices, and treat every client like family. This approach has resulted in hundreds of satisfied homeowners and an impressive portfolio of successful developments.

Contrimar's expertise lies particularly in golf course locations, where they have developed strong relationships with La Finca Golf Resort and other premier courses in the region. Their Oasis villa series at La Finca has become synonymous with quality golf lifestyle living, offering homeowners the perfect combination of contemporary comfort and direct access to championship golf.

The team at Contrimar handles every aspect of the development process in-house, from land acquisition and architectural design to construction supervision and after-sales service. This integrated approach ensures consistent quality throughout the building process and enables Contrimar to respond quickly to client needs and customization requests.

With properties ranging from approximately €249,000 to €495,000, Contrimar makes Costa Blanca golf and beach lifestyle accessible to a broad range of international buyers. Their developments offer exceptional value for money without compromising on quality, features, or finishes.

qualitySection.intro: Contrimar's commitment to quality is evident in every home they build. From foundation to finish, each property undergoes rigorous quality control to ensure it meets the highest standards of Spanish construction. The company uses only established Spanish contractors and sources premium materials from trusted suppliers, resulting in homes built to last.
standards: Double-wall construction with thermal insulation for year-round comfort
High-quality aluminum windows with thermal break and double glazing
Pre-installation for hot/cold air conditioning throughout
Quality ceramic tiles and sanitaryware from leading manufacturers
Private swimming pools with salt chlorination systems
Extensive covered and open terraces for outdoor living
Solarium rooftop terraces with panoramic views

whyChooseSection: 20+ years experience building homes in Costa Blanca South since 2003
Specialist expertise in La Finca Golf and premium golf locations
Excellent track record for on-time delivery and quality construction
Comprehensive specification including pool, terraces, and landscaping as standard
Competitive pricing from €249,000 making golf lifestyle accessible
Strong after-sales support with local presence and dedicated service team
Flexible payment plans with typically only 30% deposit required
Personalization options available for early purchasers

faqs.question: How long has Contrimar been building in Costa Blanca?
faqs.answer: Contrimar has been building quality homes in Costa Blanca South since 2003, giving them over 20 years of local experience and expertise. During this time, they've completed numerous successful developments and built strong relationships with local authorities, contractors, and golf resorts.

faqs.question: What areas does Contrimar build in?
faqs.answer: Contrimar focuses on Costa Blanca South's most desirable locations, particularly around La Finca Golf Resort in Algorfa, Guardamar del Segura with its beautiful beaches, San Miguel de Salinas, and various locations across the Orihuela Costa. They specialize in golf lifestyle and beach-accessible properties.

faqs.question: What is the Oasis villa concept?
faqs.answer: The 'Oasis' is Contrimar's signature villa series, featuring contemporary Mediterranean design with emphasis on outdoor living. Oasis villas typically include private pools, large terraces, solarium rooftops, and landscaped gardens. The series has several variants including Oasis Laguna (townhouse-style), Oasis Villas (detached villas), and Oasis Golf (frontline golf positions).

faqs.question: Do Contrimar villas include a private pool?
faqs.answer: Yes, Contrimar villas include a private swimming pool as standard in the purchase price. Pools come equipped with salt chlorination systems for easy maintenance, and are typically accompanied by surrounding terraces and sun decks.

faqs.question: What warranty does Contrimar provide?
faqs.answer: Contrimar provides the standard Spanish construction warranties: a 10-year structural warranty (decenal), plus shorter warranties on installations, finishes, and appliances. They also have an excellent reputation for after-sales service and quickly resolving any issues that arise.

faqs.question: Can I customize my Contrimar property?
faqs.answer: Yes, Contrimar offers customization options for buyers who purchase during the early phases of construction. This can include choosing tiles, kitchen configurations, bathroom finishes, and sometimes minor layout modifications. The earlier you reserve, the more flexibility you'll have.

faqs.question: What payment schedule does Contrimar require?
faqs.answer: Typically, Contrimar requires approximately 30% deposit at reservation, with further payments during construction milestones, and the balance on completion. Exact schedules vary by development and can be discussed to accommodate your circumstances. Bank guarantees protect all payments made before completion.

faqs.question: How do I arrange a viewing of Contrimar properties?
faqs.answer: Contact us via WhatsApp (+34 634 044 970) or call us to arrange viewings of Contrimar developments. We can show you completed properties, show homes, and construction sites. We're also happy to provide virtual tours and detailed information packs for international buyers.

content.conclusion: For quality new build homes in Costa Blanca South's best locations, Contrimar delivers exceptional value and proven reliability. With 20+ years of local experience, specialist golf resort expertise, and a portfolio spanning villas, townhouses, and apartments, Contrimar offers something for every buyer. Contact us today to discover available Contrimar developments and begin your Costa Blanca journey.
